artist: Painter: After Nicolaes van Helt; Engraver: Peter de Jode, the Younger; Publisher: Jan Meyssens
description: half length portrait turned right but looking out at viewer; wearing a striped doublet, flat lace collar and a draped mantle; ring on pinkie finger of PR hand which is holding mantle around him
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

on sheet below image in black: 77  NICOLAS DE HELT STOCADE /  4 lines in French: Prit se naissance .../ ... / Maieste Tres-christiene / Nicolas de Helt Stocade pinx\'t   Petr. de Iode sculpsit   Io Meyessens excudit  | on sheet in pencil: 2-436
portfolio:
From Image de divers hommes (1649)
The true effegies of the most eminent Painters (1705)
title: Nicolas de Helt Stocade
